data.name: Swiss Lightning Talks
data.description:
Hi, Swiss community! We are organizing Our first Lightning talks, short technical .NET development related talks of 10 to 15 minutes of duration.
Submit your paper today, Our intention is to execute the first session on July 28 during around 2-3 Hours (TBD). Dare submit your session and jump into …

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.name: Linaro Virtual Connect 2020
relatedRecords.description: Every six months, over 300 of the world’s leading open source engineers working on Arm get together for a full week of engineering sessions and hacking at Linaro Connect.
